mapper.select: SELECT Q.qrefer, Q.qsubject, Q.qdate, u.nickname, Q.readnum FROM QNABOARD Q JOIN USERINFO U ON Q.email = U.email ORDER BY qrefer desc OFFSET (#{currPage}-1) * #{amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT Q.qrefer, Q.qsubject, Q.qcontent, Q.qdate, U.nickname, Q.readnum FROM QNABOARD Q JOIN USERINFO U ON Q.email = U.email WHERE Q.qrefer = #{qrefer}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNABOARD(QREFER, QSUBJECT, QCONTENT, QDATE, NICKNAME, EMAIL, READNUM) VALUES(SEQ_QNABOARD.nextval, #{qsubject}, #{qcontent}, sysdate, #{nickname}, #{email}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(qrefer) FROM QNABOARD WHERE qrefer > 0

SELECT Q.QREFER, Q.QSUBJECT, Q.QDATE, U.EMAIL, U.NICKNAME FROM QNABOARD Q JOIN USERINFO U ON Q.EMAIL = U.EMAIL WHERE Q.QSUBJECT LIKE #{keyword} ORDER BY QREFER DESC OFFSET (#{cri.currPage}-1) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT qrerefer, qrecontent, qredate, qrefer, email FROM QNABOARDRE WHERE QREFER = #{qrefer} ORDER BY qrerefer desc OFFSET (#{cri.currPage}-1) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNABOARDRE(qrerefer, qrecontent, qredate, qrefer, email) VALUES(SEQ_FREEBOARDRE.nextval, #{qrecontent}, sysdate, #{qrefer}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(qrerefer) FROM QNABOARDRE WHERE qrerefer > 0
